name: Slapper (Nexetiks, janskia, Cichy93, Rondaar, Horun)
description:
Instructions

Click on Rocks to generate resources. Hold LMB on the Red Mouth to spend them for Workers! Drop workers on Rocks to make them work! Click on enemies to kill them!

A small game made during our company's gamejam. In two busy days B) It's a bit buggy, so please consider that, we might release patches later on.

Maciek 'Rondaar' Sozanski - Visuals and Shaders programming

Adam 'Pawelek/Nexetiks' - Gameplay Programming

Adam 'Jan' Jański - Music, Sound Design and Audio Programming

 Paweł 'Woody/Horun' Stolarczyk - Design, Models, Project Management
